nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
# ðŸ“¢ Auto-Post Medium Articles to LinkedIn with Telegram Alerts

This n8n workflow automates your LinkedIn posting by fetching articles from [medium.com](medium.com) twice a day (9:00 AM and 7:00 PM), ensuring consistent content sharing without manual effort.

To prevent duplicates, it stores posted article IDs in Airtable. It also sends a Telegram message after every successful post, so you stay updated.

---

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## âœ… Features

- ðŸ•’ Runs twice daily at 9:00 AM and 7:00 PM (customizable)
- ðŸ“° Fetches latest medium.com articles by tag
- ðŸ“‚ Uses Airtable to avoid reposting the same article
- ðŸ“¢ Posts to your LinkedIn profile or company page
- ðŸ“¬ Sends a Telegram notification after successful posting
- âš™ï¸ Fully customizable schedule, tags, and post format

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Linkedin Automation

## Overview
Automated workflow: Linkedin Automation. This workflow integrates 10 different services: filter, stickyNote, httpRequest, telegram, airtable. It contains 24 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 24
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Get List of records used**: airtable
- **Update the used node**: airtable
- **map used articls ids**: code
- **filter only unused Ids**: filter
- **get random tags**: code
- **sent the status**: telegram
- **Morning  9 Clock**: scheduleTrigger
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **fetch article ids from tag**: httpRequest
- ... and 14 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
